argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcdvsval.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcdvsval.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcdvsval.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcdvsval.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 5 |  | lcdvsval.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | lcdvsval.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` S ) |
| 7 |  | lcdvsval.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 8 |  | lcdvsval.f | |- F = ( Base ` C ) |
| 9 |  | lcdvsval.m | |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) |
| 10 |  | lcdvsval.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 11 |  | lcdvsval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. R ) |
| 12 |  | lcdvsval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 13 |  | lcdvsval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LDual ` U ) = ( LDual ` U ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) = ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 14, 15, 7, 9, 10 | #P_lcdvs | |- ( ph -> .xb = ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb G ) = ( X ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) G ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( X .xb G ) ` A ) = ( ( X ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) G ) ` A ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LFnl ` U ) = ( LFnl ` U ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 10 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 21 | 1, 7, 8, 2, 19, 10, 12 | #P_lcdvbaselfl | |- ( ph -> G e. ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 3, 4, 5, 6, 14, 15, 20, 11, 21, 13 | #P_ldualvsval | |- ( ph -> ( ( X ( .s ` ( LDual ` U ) ) G ) ` A ) = ( ( G ` A ) .x. X ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 22 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( X .xb G ) ` A ) = ( ( G ` A ) .x. X ) ) |
